did.abstract: Collection consists of letters by Hamilton to family members, describing his stay in Paris and his journey through France to the British embassy in Madrid. Hamilton reported occasionally on the political atmosphere in Madrid. His letters offer detailed description of social and sporting events, including bullfights, balls, and hunts. Among the people mentoned in Hamilton's lettters are Washington Irving and the English painter Sir David Wilkie.
